alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:35PM CDT until September 25 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Union County in south central Arkansas... Northwestern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... North central Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 434 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cooley, or 8 miles southeast of Junction City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Junction City, Farmerville, Bernice, Cooley, Dubach, Spearsville, Lillie, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Lockhart, Shiloh and Taylorville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
